title: Leaver Buster
body:
Ok now it's going too far.
I got leaverbuster and I'm on my last low priority queue. 
I selected Coop vs AI and started the timer.
But when the timer ended, it would restart the timer.
Wtf is this bs.

replies.body: I took a look at your account and it seems you've played through your remaining LPQ. Let me know if you run into issues with this again.
yeah, all I had to do was to play another gamemode and wait 20 min. again.
